groups.name: Springtime Buffet Brunch Pricing [Available April 3 - May 9]

items.title: $65 per adult, plus tax and gratuity
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.

items.title: $36 per child (3-9), plus tax and gratuity
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.

items.title: Cold Selections
items.description: Mini Danishes, Croissants, Cinnamon Rolls, and Muffins; Mini Bagels with Assorted Cream Cheese; Smoked Salmon Blini Cream Cheese, Onions, Capers, Tomato and Chives; Poached Jumbo Shrimp Cocktail; Build your Own Salad Bar; Pearl Couscous salad/ Carrot and Fennel Salad/ Caesar/ Fresh Berry Salad; Build your Own Granola Parfait to Include Flavored Yogurt, Granola; Coconut Chia Parfait; Assorted Sliced Fruits and Strawberries ; Assorted Cereals with Milk, and Non-Dairy Milk & Assorted Mini Beignets and Doughnuts

items.description: Omelet Station with Vegetables, Cheese, and Herbs

items.title: Carving Station
items.description: Carving Station: Slow Roasted Prime Rib of Beef, Turkey Breast

items.title: Hot Selections
items.description: Cheese Blintz with Berry Sauce and Fresh Mint; Country Style Breakfast Potatoes; Sesame Chicken; Orange Saffron Salmon; Cilantro Rice, Sautéed Vegetables; Scrambled Eggs with Chives; Duck confit Campanelle; Egg White Frittata with Spinach, Tomato and Green Asparagus, Tomato Sauce; Bacon, Breakfast Sausage Link and Turkey Bacon; Seasonal Benedicts; Mickey Waffles with Powdered Sugar and Syrup; Classic Mickey Pancakes with Whipped Butter and Syrup; Steel Cut Oatmeal with Brown Sugar and Raisins; Brioche French toast served with Powdered Sugar; Daily Devil Eggs; Avocado Toast with Whipped Ricotta, Sun Gold Tomato, Bacon and Pea Tendril; Breakfast Pizza & Peanut Butter Jelly Pizza

groups.name: Springtime Buffet Dinner Pricing [Available April 3 - May 9]

items.title: $75 per adult, plus tax and gratuity
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.

items.title: $39 per child (3-9), plus tax and gratuity
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.

items.title: Cold Selections
items.description: Assorted Bread Baskets, Fresh Fruit; Poached Jumbo Shrimp Cocktail; Snow Crab Claw Cocktail; Cheese Board and Vegetable Crudité; Smoked Salmon Blini with Crème Fraiche, and Chives and Breakfast Radish; Build your Own Granola Parfait to Include Flavored Yogurt, Granola, and Fruits Compote; Assorted Sliced Fruits and Strawberries; Build your Own Salad Bar; Pearl Couscous salad/ Carrot and Fennel Salad/ Caesar/ Fresh Berry Salad & Ambrosia salad/ Carrot Zucchini cake/ Seasonal Tres Leches

items.title: Carving Station
items.description: Carving Station: Slow Roasted Prime Rib of Beef, Turkey Breast

items.title: Hot Selections
items.description: Nightly Soups; Honey Roasted Carrots and rolled oat Dukkha; Orange Saffron Salmon; Garlic Mashed Potato, Rice, Sautéed Vegetables; Sesame Chicken; Duck confit Campanelle; BBQ Pork Ribs w/ Crispy Corn Curls; Sweet Potato tot Hash; Mini Pot Pie; Chicken Tenders; Macaroni & Cheese; Golden Mini Corn Dogs; Assorted Pizza Selections & Seasonal Desserts and Baked Goods
